summary: Internet Computer dapp scaffolded with a Motoko backend canister and a React (Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui) frontend implementing a basic search experience with Internet Identity integration and generated branding assets.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister implemented in Motoko with generated Candid bindings and frontend actor integration.

existing_features.title: React frontend scaffold (Vite + Tailwind + shadcn/ui)
existing_features.description: Frontend application scaffolded with Vite, TailwindCSS, and shadcn/ui component set and configuration.

existing_features.title: Search UI flow (home + results pages)
existing_features.description: Search form and results list implemented with dedicated pages for search home and search results.

existing_features.title: Mock search dataset for local/demo usage
existing_features.description: Local mock dataset used to support/demo the search experience during development.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Hooks and configuration to authenticate users via Internet Identity and use authenticated actors/requests.

existing_features.title: Client-side storage utility
existing_features.description: Utility for persisting/retrieving client-side state via a StorageClient helper.

existing_features.title: Generated branding assets (search logos)
existing_features.description: Generated logo assets included for the search app (wide + square variants).

existing_features.title: Add basic website navigation so users can move between primary pages from a consistent header (at minimum: Home and Search).
Create a website-style Home page layout that clearly explains what the site is and provides a primary call-to-action to use the existing search experience.
Add a consistent website footer with basic site links (e.g., Home, Search) and a short copyright line.

Apply a single, coherent visual theme across the website (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) with a distinct style that is used consistently on Home, Search Home, and Search Results pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a basic website (initially requested as a 'Google website' / general website).

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite with TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui component library.
Backend is an Internet Computer canister written in Motoko, with Candid declarations consumed by the frontend.
Frontend uses custom hooks for actor creation, Internet Identity auth, and query management.

generatedImages.description: Generated wide logo for the search app.
Generated square logo for the search app.

projectName: Turn the app into a simple multi-page website experience
